typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as float,
		GET_QUANTITY as float,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
		DELETED_OFFER as string,
		HOT_OFFER as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OfferParquetSCD
source(output(
		Offer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Offer as string,
		Current_Offer as string,
		Coupon_Indicator as string,
		Current_Coupon_Indicator as string,
		Offer_Type as string,
		Current_Offer_Type as string,
		Buy_Quantity as double,
		Current_Buy_Quantity as double,
		Get_Quantity as double,
		Current_Get_Quantity as double,
		Coupon_Scan_Code as long,
		Current_Coupon_Scan_Code as long,
		Offer_Segment as string,
		Current_Offer_Segment as string,
		Offer_Program as string,
		Current_Offer_Program as string,
		Offer_Threshold_Type as string,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Type as string,
		Offer_Redemption_Points as integer,
		Current_Offer_Redemption_Points as integer,
		Offer_Award_Points as integer,
		Current_Offer_Award_Points as integer,
		Offer_Threshold_Quantity as integer,
		Current_Offer_Threshold_Quantity as integer,
		Offer_Source_System as string,
		Current_Offer_Source_System as string,
		Offer_Reason as string,
		Current_Offer_Reason as string,
		Offer_Multiple as integer,
		Current_Offer_Multiple as integer,
		Price_Type as string,
		Current_Price_Type as string,
		Deleted_Offer as string,
		Current_Deleted_Offer as string,
		Hot_Offer as string,
		Current_Hot_Offer as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> OfferDIM
OfferDIM select(mapColumn(
		TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID = Offer_Surrogate_Id,
		TGT_ID = ID,
		TGT_OFFER = Offer,
		TGT_Current_OFFER = Current_Offer,
		TGT_COUPON_INDICATOR = Coupon_Indicator,
		TGT_Current_COUPON_INDICATOR = Current_Coupon_Indicator,
		TGT_OFFER_TYPE = Offer_Type,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_TYPE = Current_Offer_Type,
		TGT_BUY_QUANTITY = Buy_Quantity,
		TGT_Current_BUY_QUANTITY = Current_Buy_Quantity,
		TGT_GET_QUANTITY = Get_Quantity,
		TGT_Current_GET_QUANTITY = Current_Get_Quantity,
		TGT_COUPON_SCAN_CODE = Coupon_Scan_Code,
		TGT_Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE = Current_Coupon_Scan_Code,
		TGT_OFFER_SEGMENT = Offer_Segment,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_SEGMENT = Current_Offer_Segment,
		TGT_OFFER_PROGRAM = Offer_Program,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_PROGRAM = Current_Offer_Program,
		TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = Offer_Threshold_Type,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = Current_Offer_Threshold_Type,
		TGT_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = Offer_Redemption_Points,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = Current_Offer_Redemption_Points,
		TGT_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = Offer_Award_Points,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = Current_Offer_Award_Points,
		TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = Offer_Threshold_Quantity,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = Current_Offer_Threshold_Quantity,
		TGT_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = Offer_Source_System,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = Current_Offer_Source_System,
		TGT_OFFER_REASON = Offer_Reason,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_REASON = Current_Offer_Reason,
		TGT_OFFER_MULTIPLE = Offer_Multiple,
		TGT_Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE = Current_Offer_Multiple,
		TGT_PRICE_TYPE = Price_Type,
		TGT_Current_PRICE_TYPE = Current_Price_Type,
		TGT_DELETED_OFFER = Deleted_Offer,
		TGT_Current_DELETED_OFFER = Current_Deleted_Offer,
		TGT_HOT_OFFER = Hot_Offer,
		TGT_Current_HOT_OFFER = Current_Hot_Offer,
		TGT_LAST_CHANGED = Last_Changed,
		TGT_LAST_DML = Last_Dml,
		TGT_EFF_START_DT = Eff_Start_Dt,
		TGT_EFF_END_DT = Eff_End_Dt,
		TGT_IsActive = IsActive,
		TGT_CRC_VAL = Crc_Val
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTGT
SortSrcID derive(IsActive = 1,
		EFF_START_DT = toDate('1900-01-01'),
		EFF_END_DT = toDate('9999-12-31'),
		CRCVAL = case(isNull(ID),TGT_CRC_VAL,md5(OFFER,COUPON_INDICATOR,OFFER_TYPE,BUY_QUANTITY,GET_QUANTITY,COUPON_SCAN_CODE,OFFER_SEGMENT,OFFER_PROGRAM,OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,OFFER_REASON,OFFER_MULTIPLE,PRICE_TYPE,DELETED_OFFER,HOT_OFFER))) ~> DerivedColumnCRCVAL
SelectTGT aggregate(MAXVAL = max(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) ~> AGGMAXVAL
OfferParquetSCD, AGGMAXVAL join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSRCMaxTGTKey
DerivedColumnCRCVAL split((isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)  && LAST_DML>=0) || (not(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && IsActive==1 ),
	(not(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL == TGT_CRC_VAL) && IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) && LAST_DML < 0,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@(SurrogateKey, NoSurrogateKey, Delete)
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@SurrogateKey keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> CreateSurrogateKey
DerivedColumnSurrogateKey split(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)  && LAST_DML>=0,
	not(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && LAST_DML>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && LAST_DML>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewChange@(NewRecords, SCD2, SCDExpiry)
CreateSurrogateKey derive(out_SurrogateKey = toInteger(SurrogateKey) + iifNull(MAXVAL,0,MAXVAL)) ~> DerivedColumnSurrogateKey
NewChange@SCD2 derive(expiry_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate()) ~> Expiry
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@Delete derive(delete_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate(),
		delete_inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumnDelete
JoinSRCMaxTGTKey, SelectTGT join(ID == TGT_ID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSrcTgt
NewChange@SCD2 derive(scd_EFF_START_DT = currentDate()) ~> DerivedSCD2
Expiry, NewChange@SCDExpiry union(byName: true)~> UnionExpiry
UnionExpiry derive(final_EFF_END_DT = case(TGT_IsActive == 0,TGT_EFF_END_DT,expiry_EFF_END_DATE),
		Inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn2
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@NoSurrogateKey derive(del_EFF_END_DATE = case(LAST_DML<0 && TGT_EFF_END_DT < currentDate(),TGT_EFF_END_DT,
LAST_DML<0 && TGT_EFF_END_DT > currentDate(),currentDate()
, TGT_EFF_END_DT),
		del_inactive = case(LAST_DML<0,0,TGT_IsActive),
		del_LAST_DML = case(LAST_DML<0,LAST_DML,TGT_LAST_DML)) ~> DerivedColumn3
JoinSrcTgt sort(asc(ID, false)) ~> SortSrcID
NewChange@NewRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		Current_OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		GET_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY as double,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		Current_OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE as string,
		DELETED_OFFER as string,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER as string,
		HOT_OFFER as string,
		Current_HOT_OFFER as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer,
		EFF_START_DT as date,
		EFF_END_DT as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		CRC_VAL as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['OfferDIM_New.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID = out_SurrogateKey,
		ID,
		OFFER,
		Current_OFFER = OFFER,
		COUPON_INDICATOR,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR = COUPON_INDICATOR,
		OFFER_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE = OFFER_TYPE,
		BUY_QUANTITY,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY = BUY_QUANTITY,
		GET_QUANTITY,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY = GET_QUANTITY,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE = COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		OFFER_SEGMENT,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT = OFFER_SEGMENT,
		OFFER_PROGRAM,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM = OFFER_PROGRAM,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		OFFER_REASON,
		Current_OFFER_REASON = OFFER_REASON,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE = OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		PRICE_TYPE,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE = PRICE_TYPE,
		DELETED_OFFER,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER = DELETED_OFFER,
		HOT_OFFER,
		Current_HOT_OFFER = HOT_OFFER,
		LAST_CHANGED,
		LAST_DML,
		EFF_START_DT,
		EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive,
		CRC_VAL = CRCVAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNew
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		Current_OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		GET_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY as double,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		Current_OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE as string,
		DELETED_OFFER as string,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER as string,
		HOT_OFFER as string,
		Current_HOT_OFFER as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer,
		EFF_START_DT as date,
		EFF_END_DT as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		CRC_VAL as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['OfferDIMChangeExpiry.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID = TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID,
		ID = TGT_ID,
		OFFER = TGT_OFFER,
		Current_OFFER = OFFER,
		COUPON_INDICATOR = TGT_COUPON_INDICATOR,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR = COUPON_INDICATOR,
		OFFER_TYPE = TGT_OFFER_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE = OFFER_TYPE,
		BUY_QUANTITY = TGT_BUY_QUANTITY,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY = BUY_QUANTITY,
		GET_QUANTITY = TGT_GET_QUANTITY,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY = GET_QUANTITY,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE = TGT_COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE = COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		OFFER_SEGMENT = TGT_OFFER_SEGMENT,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT = OFFER_SEGMENT,
		OFFER_PROGRAM = TGT_OFFER_PROGRAM,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM = OFFER_PROGRAM,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = TGT_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = TGT_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = TGT_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		OFFER_REASON = TGT_OFFER_REASON,
		Current_OFFER_REASON = OFFER_REASON,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE = TGT_OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE = OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		PRICE_TYPE = TGT_PRICE_TYPE,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE = PRICE_TYPE,
		DELETED_OFFER = TGT_DELETED_OFFER,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER = DELETED_OFFER,
		HOT_OFFER = TGT_HOT_OFFER,
		Current_HOT_OFFER = HOT_OFFER,
		LAST_CHANGED = TGT_LAST_CHANGED,
		LAST_DML = TGT_LAST_DML,
		EFF_START_DT = TGT_EFF_START_DT,
		EFF_END_DT = final_EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive = Inactive,
		CRC_VAL = TGT_CRC_VAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkExpiry
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		Current_OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		GET_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY as double,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		Current_OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE as string,
		DELETED_OFFER as string,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER as string,
		HOT_OFFER as string,
		Current_HOT_OFFER as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer,
		EFF_START_DT as date,
		EFF_END_DT as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		CRC_VAL as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['OfferDIMNoChange.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID = TGT_Offer_Surrogate_ID,
		ID = TGT_ID,
		OFFER = TGT_OFFER,
		Current_OFFER = TGT_Current_OFFER,
		COUPON_INDICATOR = TGT_COUPON_INDICATOR,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR = TGT_Current_COUPON_INDICATOR,
		OFFER_TYPE = TGT_OFFER_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE = TGT_Current_OFFER_TYPE,
		BUY_QUANTITY = TGT_BUY_QUANTITY,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY = TGT_Current_BUY_QUANTITY,
		GET_QUANTITY = TGT_GET_QUANTITY,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY = TGT_Current_GET_QUANTITY,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE = TGT_COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE = TGT_Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE,
		OFFER_SEGMENT = TGT_OFFER_SEGMENT,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT = TGT_Current_OFFER_SEGMENT,
		OFFER_PROGRAM = TGT_OFFER_PROGRAM,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM = TGT_Current_OFFER_PROGRAM,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE = TGT_Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = TGT_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS = TGT_Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = TGT_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS = TGT_Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = TGT_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY = TGT_Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = TGT_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM = TGT_Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		OFFER_REASON = TGT_OFFER_REASON,
		Current_OFFER_REASON = TGT_Current_OFFER_REASON,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE = TGT_OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE = TGT_Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE,
		PRICE_TYPE = TGT_PRICE_TYPE,
		Current_PRICE_TYPE = TGT_Current_PRICE_TYPE,
		DELETED_OFFER = TGT_DELETED_OFFER,
		Current_DELETED_OFFER = TGT_Current_DELETED_OFFER,
		HOT_OFFER = TGT_HOT_OFFER,
		Current_HOT_OFFER = TGT_Current_HOT_OFFER,
		LAST_CHANGED = TGT_LAST_CHANGED,
		LAST_DML = del_LAST_DML,
		EFF_START_DT = TGT_EFF_START_DT,
		EFF_END_DT = del_EFF_END_DATE,
		IsActive = del_inactive,
		CRC_VAL = TGT_CRC_VAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNoChange
DerivedColumnDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Offer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		OFFER as string,
		Current_OFFER as string,
		COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		Current_COUPON_INDICATOR as string,
		OFFER_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_TYPE as string,
		BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_BUY_QUANTITY as double,
		GET_QUANTITY as double,
		Current_GET_QUANTITY as double,
		COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		Current_COUPON_SCAN_CODE as long,
		OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		Current_OFFER_SEGMENT as string,
		OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		Current_OFFER_PROGRAM as string,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_TYPE as string,
		OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_REDEMPTION_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		Current_OFFER_AWARD_POINTS as integer,
		OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		Current_OFFER_THRESHOLD_QUANTITY as integer,
		OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		Current_OFFER_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		OFFER_REASON as string,
		Current_OFFER_REASON as string,
		OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		Current_OFFER_MULTIPLE as integer,
		PRICE_TYPE as string,
